owners.name: Vinod Sukumaran
owners.title: Co-owner
owners.about: K S Vinod is an award-winning entrepreneur, philanthropist, and internationally acclaimed sportsman, recognized as the WBC Middleweight Champion of Australia (2023) and WCB Champion UK. A former Mr. India and Mr. South India, Vinod is trained across multiple combat disciplines and serves as a WBC Cares Ambassador. As the force behind a global portfolio of companies across India, Australia, and Dubai—spanning fitness, asset management, real estate, travel, consultancy, and security—he is known for transforming vision into impactful ventures. Dedicated to empowering communities, Vinod works actively through human rights organizations and youth-focused initiatives, championing a mission to inspire healthier, stronger, and more active lives across generations.
